# Creating a new file

You can also create your own file by [copying the example file](#xown-copy) or [uploading your own](#ximport), this file will then be added to the dropdown list in the top left-hand side.

![image-20220723134329170](_assets/image-20220723134329170.png)

- and then upload a map in the form of an [Excel file](#xuploading-and-updating) (.xls or .xlsx).
